sentence.Network_en: How to control or debilitate your opponent immediately - irrespective of their size or martial arts background.
sentence.Network_cn: 如何控制或削弱你的对手立刻 - 不论其规模大小或武侠背景.

list.abs: 其它研究则表明 [8 ] , 焦虑对学习主要是起阻碍作用, 这类焦虑被称为阻碍性焦虑 ( debilitating anxiety) 。为此, 学者们对焦虑的.
一种是退缩性焦虑 （debilitating anxiety）。它使学习者逃避学习任务。
神草 ginseng神衰 debilitated spirit神堂 BL-44\w
偏食异物 perverted appetite偏衰 abnormally debilitated偏衰 abnormally weak
庞培氏病是一种罕见但严重的衰竭性疾病（debilitating disease），急剧降低了人的肌肉及呼吸功能，该病在每4万到30万人中影响1人。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin debilitat- 'weakened', from the verb debilitare, from debilitas (see debility)

entry.def: If you are debilitated by something such as an illness, it causes your body or mind to become gradually weaker.

example.ex: Stewart took over yesterday when Russell was debilitated by a stomach virus.
example.tran: 昨天拉塞尔因肠胃病毒感染身体不适，由斯图尔特暂时接手。

entry.tran: 削弱（组织、社团或政府）的力量
entry.def: To debilitate an organization, society, or government means to gradually make it weaker.

example.ex: ...their efforts to debilitate the political will of the Western alliance.
example.tran: 他们试图削弱西方联盟的政治决心的努力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能力;本领;才能,才干;专门技能,天资
stems_affixes.word_buile: abili能力+ty表名词→n.能力;本领;才能,才干;专门技能,天资
de去掉+bility=ability[n.能力;本领;才能,才干;专门技能,天资]→n.衰弱,虚弱
de去掉+bili=abili能力+tate=ate表动词→去掉能力→使衰弱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 提供周转资金, 予以穿着
stems_affixes.word_buile: h可看作是have+abili能力+tate=ate表动词→有什么能力→使具备能力
re重新+habilitate具备能力→v.修复,恢复[职位等]

means.word_mean: 使(人或人的身体)非常虚弱

sentences.cn: 酷热使得很多人体弱力衰。
